;;; TOOL: run-wasm-decompile
(module
  (type (;0;) (func (param i32 i32) (result i32)))
  (func (;0;) (type 0) (param i32 i32) (result i32)
    local.get 0
    loop (param i32) (result i32)  ;; label = @1
      unreachable
      br_table 0 (;@1;) 0 (;@1;)
      i32.add
    end))
(;; STDOUT ;;;
function f_a(a:int, b:int):int {
  a + br_table[L_a, ..L_a](unreachable);
  return loop L_a {
         }
}

;;; STDOUT ;;)
